column1: Column 1: Color- The color of the crab (blue or orange)
Column 2: Sex-The sex of the crab (male or female)
Column 3: Frontal_lobe- The measurement of the frontal lobe(face/head) of the crab
Column 4: Rear_width- The measurement of the width of the rear(backside) of the crab
Column 5: Carapace length- The measurement of the length of the carapace(shell)
Column 6: Carapace width- The measurement of the width of the carapace(shell)
Column 7: Body depth- The measurement of the depth (thickness) of the crab tom to bottom
Column 8: Latitude- the location in which the crab was found
